Class Cable

java.lang.Object
task1.Cable
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkElement
public class Cable extends Object implements NetworkElement
Represents a cable in a network.

Each cable has a name, a length (in meters) and a price-per-meter. Visitors can visit this element to perform operations such as cost calculation or display.
